sensortoolkit.qc._interval_downsampling.apply_downsamplingÔÉÅ

apply_downsampling(df_list, downsampling_interval)[source]ÔÉÅ

Helper function for applying downsampled averaging to datasets for the passed downsampling interval.

Parameters

  • df_list (list) ‚Äì List of sensor dataframes at original, recorded sampling frequency.

  • downsampling_interval (int or float) ‚Äì The downsampling interval, in seconds.

Returns

Modified list of sensor dataframes with downsampled, uniformly spaced timestamp intervals.

Return type

df_list (list)
